scripts.install:all: pnpm install; cd apps/backend; pip install -r requirements.txt; pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
scripts.dev:dashboard: node scripts/port_manager.js kill-service FRONTEND_DASHBOARD && pnpm --filter frontend-dashboard dev
scripts.dev:backend: node scripts/port_manager.js kill-service BACKEND_API && pnpm --filter backend dev
scripts.dev:desktop: node scripts/port_manager.js kill-service DESKTOP_APP && pnpm --filter desktop-app start
scripts.dev:all: node scripts/kill_port_3000.js && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --raw "pnpm dev:backend" "pnpm dev:dashboard" "pnpm dev:desktop"
